file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Gosh
  description: very simple URL shortener, written in educational purposes
  version: '1'
  
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:5000{basePath}
    description: local development server
    variables:
      basePath:
        default: /api/v1
    
paths:
  /url/{identifier}/:
    get:
      summary: return information about short url identifier
      tags:
        - URL
      description: get details about existing short URL
      parameters:
        - name: identifier
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          example: "eH3f"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: JSON object with identifier and long URL
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/URL'
        '404':
          description: Not Found
  
  /url/:
    post:
      description: create new identifier for given URL
      tags:
        - URL
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                url:
                  type: string
                  example: 'http://example.com'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/URL'

components:
  schemas:
    URL:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          example: 'dNe2i'
        url:
          type: string
          example: 'http://example.com/'
